citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 2:45pm on
October 31, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and calling the phone number
on file. The inspector waited for approximately 30 minutes before leaving the facility. Failure to provide access to the
facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result
in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 2:45pm on 
October 31, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and calling the phone number 
on file. The inspector waited for approximately 30 minutes before leaving the facility. Failure to provide access to the 
facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result 
in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
